title: Sin city (comic) font
content: I don't know who letters Sin City, perhaps one of comic book aficiandos will chime in, but Dark Horse comics has used computer fonts before from [Comicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000747/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/). Even if Frank Miller does the lettering himself, I'm sure you can find something very similar over at Comicraft in their lettering section. For less expensive comic book fonts, I'd suggest [Blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000747/http:/www.blambot.com/). I hope this helps.
author: James Gareth

comments.content: There is no credit for a letterer so I presume that Frank Miller lettered the stories as well as writing, layout and inking.
